cause.description:
This Group Is Designed To Raise Awareness Of The Problem With Our Current Drug Laws...
This Land Of Ours Was Built Upon Many Great Ideals, A Good Number Of Which Are Neglected Today...
There Are Far Greather Promblems In Our World Today Which We Should Be Looking At And Working Together To Help Solve...
Drugs, At Least Marijuana, Should Be Legal For Responsible Use...
1. Drug Laws Must Be Changed
2. Open The Mind, Free The World
3. Life Liberty & The Pursuit Of Happiness
cause.mission: Stop The Needless Arrests Of Many Innocent, Undeserving Men and Women
cause.name: Free Nation
